items.sentence: Tom and John are often mistaken for brothers.
Tom and John were fighting on the playground.
Tom and Mary are busy planning their wedding.
Tom and Mary are no longer on speaking terms.
Tom and Mary are on the verge of breaking up.
What\'s really going on between Tom and Mary?
What\'s the best way to avoid mosquito bites?
What\'s your favorite image editing software?
Tom thinks he\'ll go shopping this afternoon.
Your question is not relevant to the subject.
I can\'t communicate with Tom like I used to.
Tom\'s situation is getting more complicated.
What\'s your favorite non-alcoholic beverage?
I saw several people hanging out in the park.
I saw some empty bottles lying on the ground.
I saw the old man feed his dog chicken bones.
I don\'t see what you\'re so concerned about.
I don\'t think I\'m the only one who noticed.
I don\'t know when Tom is planning to arrive.
I don\'t know who Tom will go to Boston with.
